body_content.explanation: opposed to radical ideas or groups (= those believing that there should be great social or political change):
examples: Anti-radical sentiment was running high at the time.
The wrong phrasing of an anti-radical statement can trigger days of riots.

body_content.explanation: working against the effects of free radicals (= molecules in the body that have an extra electron and react very easily with other molecules):
examples: Researchers determined the antiradical capacity of various carotenoids.
